name: ancient-graph
description: Graph methods and event handlers based on adapter.
author: Ivan S Glazunov <ivansglazunov@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run compile && mocha tests/index.js --require source-map-support/register
scripts.jsdoc: git submodule update --init --recursive && cd ./doc && git checkout gh-pages && cd ../ && npm i && rm -r ./doc/*/ && find ./doc ! -name '.git' -type f -exec rm -rf {} + && jsdoc ./src/lib/*.js ./src/lib/adapters/*.js ./README.md -r -d ./doc -t ./node_modules/minami -c ./jsdoc.conf.json
